items.title: Can McDonald’s Corporation (MCD) Keep Serving Up Dividend Growth?
items.description: McDonald’s Corporation (NYSE:MCD) is included among the 10 Best Passive Income Stocks to Buy Now. The company currently offers a quarterly dividend of $1.77 per share and has a dividend yield of 2.36%, as of July 10. It is just two years away from becoming a Dividend King, with a current dividend growth streak spanning […]
